00510     class _OgreExport MovableObjectFactory : public MovableAlloc
00511     {
00512     protected:
00514         unsigned long mTypeFlag;
00515 
00517         virtual MovableObject* createInstanceImpl(
00518             const String& name, const NameValuePairList* params = 0) = 0;
00519     public:
00520         MovableObjectFactory() : mTypeFlag(0xFFFFFFFF) {}
00521         virtual ~MovableObjectFactory() {}
00523         virtual const String& getType(void) const = 0;
00524 
00532         virtual MovableObject* createInstance(
00533             const String& name, SceneManager* manager, 
00534             const NameValuePairList* params = 0);
00536         virtual void destroyInstance(MovableObject* obj) = 0;
00537 
00551         virtual bool requestTypeFlags(void) const { return false; }
00560         void _notifyTypeFlags(unsigned long flag) { mTypeFlag = flag; }
00561 
00567         unsigned long getTypeFlags(void) const { return mTypeFlag; }
00568 
00569     };
